opmode

Class LinearOpMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.VirtualRobotController.LinearOpModeBase
      • opmode.LinearOpMode
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArcadeDrive, DemoOpMode1, LineFollow

    public abstract class LinearOpMode
extends VirtualRobotController.LinearOpModeBase
    OpModes in this simulator must extend LinearOpMode.

    • Method Detail

      • runOpMode

        public abstract void runOpMode()
        OpModes must override the abstract runOpMode() method.

      • sleep

        protected void sleep(long milliseconds)
        Pause execution of the OpMode for the indicated number of milliseconds
        Parameters:
        milliseconds - Note: during this pause, the motors will continue running at their previous power settings.

      • opModeIsActive

        protected boolean opModeIsActive()
        Determines whether there has been a request to terminate execution of this OpMode (for example, clicking the "STOP" button would result in such a request). This method also gives other threads an opportunity to run. Any long-running loop (more than a few iterations) should include a call to this method.
        Returns:
        TRUE if NO request to terminate; FALSE if there is a request to terminate.
